Putinism as it is
03 Nov 2019, 21:35 by asyav



The Story of a Dictator: Mobutu Sese Seko | Putinism as it is # 1 üëâ Subscription to the Sharp Corner channel https://goo.gl/Vp7YN3 üåÉ Many are wondering about the ideological roots of Putinism in Russia. Where did this special, to put it mildly, come from ... www.youtube.com
For watchmen like pavelhunt, a link to a playlist consisting of 8 films in which they try to understand who Putin is, how he came to power and who his accomplices are. Well, a brief retelling of several series, so that the guards would not be nervous. Series One - Many are wondering about the ideological roots of Putinism in Russia. Where did this, to put it mildly, specific ideology and method of government come from? Someone is looking for roots in the USSR, in the Soviet KGB, someone is in the criminal world, among the mafia. Second series - This video shows the path of one person, nicknamed the Gray Cardinal of Putin's Russia. His story is ambiguous, full of ups and downs, and on his way he will meet many interesting characters ... Some of them occupy very high posts now. Series Three - What words have been enriched by Russia during the years of Vladimir Putin's reign? What connects Valentina Matvienko and Nikolai Patrushev, and Sergei Skipal with Donald Trump? Who is Baron Von Bossner? Who was the Novice for? Secrets of the 2014 Olympics in Russia, ‚ÄúTrump ours,‚Äù Steel‚Äôs dossier and much, much more in the new series of the series ‚ÄúPutinism as it is.‚Äù I hope pavelhunt is enough for the post?
